column.caption: Column
title: Interview
Architecture and Society No.33
contents: CEO Bongjai Shin discusses the latest design automation trends in an interview with Architecture & Society. Bongjai shares his views on the ways in which these trends will change not only building designs but also the role of architects.

services.summary: In Spring 2020, architectural designer Bongjai Shin and Ph.D. in mathematics and A.I. developer Gahye Jeong co-founded their firm, Zenerate Inc., secured their seed funding from three venture capital firms, offering building design AI services to the Korea and US markets. They are pioneering a new path in the real estate development industry with unprecedented ways of transforming building design problems to mathematics and algorithm problems.
services.caption: Consulting Service
title: Client meeting
Processing
Delivery
content: Data collection: Project Objectives, Legal Constraints, Building Plans, Rent/Home Price Data, Construction Cost, etc.
Generate millions of options to find the most profitable one satisfying various conditions.
Provide various analysis by data sheets and web solution.

title: Our Vision
contents: In the era of artificial intelligence, how much more profit can we make if we use it for real estate development?
Zenerate began with this question.
We're pioneering a new path in the real estate development industry with unprecedented ways of transforming building design problems to mathematics and algorithm problems.
Our building design AI solution will generate and analyze various scenarios to contribute to your real estate development business with the most profitable alternative.

title: Selected for Korea AI Startup 100
contents: Zenerate was selected as Korea AI Startup 100 hosted by Korea Economic Daily and AI One Team. In the field of prop-tech, Zenerate was the only winner.

title: Attracted 4 billion investment
contents: According to the investment banking (IB) industry, DSN Investment, SL Investment, Daekyo Investment, and Asia F&I (Asia F&I) participated as investors (LPs) in Zenerate's recent 4 billion won pre-series A investment.

title: Shinhan Futures Lab, 'Proptech Gaming Tinger' Grand Prize
contents: Zenerate participated in 'Proptech Game Changer', an event jointly hosted by Shinhan Futures Lab and Asia FnI. This event was held to discover startups with high growth potential as unicorns in the Proptech field. Zenerate received the grand prize out of a total of 140 startup applicants.

program.title: How to use our service
program.caption: Our Solutions
contents: We provide AI-based building design solutions for real estate development. Depending on client’s needs, we can deliver various alternatives including the most efficient, profitable and/or cost-effective ones.
By exploring all possible design alternatives with algorithms, we maximize profits of your  development project.

team.caption: Our Team
